creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Congrats, you’ve just reached the most unexplored spot on the map! Your ‘fantasy vs. reality’ adventure in Atlantis is about to begin!

🎒 Follow Atlantis trails and explore Atlantean civilization with aspiring adventurers Robert and Nicole!

🌱 In any adventure, camp, food and tools matter the most! Set up your farm, build factories and start to craft resources!

⚒ This area is packed with mysterious ruins! Restore Atlanteans’ magic workshops with the help of powerful crystals!

🔎 Want to explore Atlantis and the local culture even better? Complete adventure goals and work on farm produce orders!

Nicole and Robert just started pitching a tent! Go help them with the rest of adventures!
descriptionShort: Explore a lost civilization, restore magic buildings & craft items

title: Atlantis Odyssey

container.value:
Charalampou Mouskou, 20
ABC BUSINESS CENTRE, 1st floor, Office 101
Paphos 8010

creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the farm & expedition island adventure of the Atlantis Odyssey game! Here you can not only dip into the exciting world of mysteries but upgrade your farming and restoring skills: this lost civilization needs your building and harvest knowledge. All you need to join this journey island is just your backpack - the farm adventure is already waiting for you!

So, what’s now? Let’s start our travel island odyssey! Congrats, you’ve just reached an unexplored spot on the world map! Your ‘fantasy vs. reality’ adventure in Atlantis is about to begin! Is it going to be a village life simulation, or some thrilling adventure roadtrip instead? You’ll never know until you check it!

🎒 Follow Atlantis trails and explore Atlantean civilization with aspiring adventurers Robert and Nicole! Will they meet some tribe life of Atlantean people? Will they build & restore an ancient magic town by themselves? Come and help them!

🌱 On any farm & adventure game, camp, food, and tools matter the most. Set up your farm, build factories and start to craft resources! Adventures in odyssey style are more exciting and complex than you could ever imagine! Farming, growing crops, gathering your own harvest are just a small part of this lost island adventure!

⚒ This area is packed with mysterious ruins! Restore Atlanteans’ magic workshops with the help of powerful crystals - be engaged in mythic & prehistoric adventures! Find all the hidden treasures and secret places of Atlantis Odyssey!

🔎 Want to explore Atlantis and the local culture even better? Complete all the trip adventure goals and work on farm produce orders! Complete challenging quests, breed animals, harvest crops, and have fun!

Nicole and Robert just started pitching a tent! Go help them with the rest of their farm & expedition adventures!
descriptionShort: Farm & expedition through a lost civilization: explore the island and restore it

🎒 Follow Atlantis trails and explore Atlantean civilization with aspiring adventurers Robert and Nicole! Will they meet some tribe life of Atlantean people? Will they build & restore an ancient magic town by themselves? Come and help them!

🌱 On any farm & adventure game, camp, food, and tools matter the most. Set up your farm, build factories and start to craft resources! Adventures in odyssey style are more exciting and complex than you could ever imagine! Farming, growing crops, gathering your own harvest are just a small part of this lost island adventure!

⚒ This area is packed with mysterious ruins! Restore Atlanteans’ magic workshops with the help of powerful crystals - be engaged in mythic & prehistoric adventures! Find all the hidden treasures and secret places of Atlantis Odyssey!

🔎 Want to explore Atlantis and the local culture even better? Complete all the trip adventure goals and work on farm produce orders! Complete challenging quests, breed animals, harvest crops, and have fun!

Nicole and Robert just started pitching a tent! Go help them with the rest of their farm & expedition adventures!
descriptionShort: Adventure & quests in a lost civilization: explore the island & enjoy the story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New permanent location - MAZE OF ILLUSIONS!
- It would seem that the adventures in the Citadel of Balance made things between humans and one stubborn Atlantean warm... But the temperature drops again: Iri'an hid something important from our heroes!
- The way to the new artifact part is long... The heroes, though, are already on the verge of a new discovery. But will it be a pleasant one?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The new permanent location is here: WILD GROVE!
- Our heroes have just saved Earth... We didn't doubt them! But saving Mi'ara and her father's shattered relationship... This task may turn out to be way more difficult than their heroic achievements!
- A new place means new acquaintances! Something rustled in the bushes and ran away... An animal? Some intelligent Atlantean beings? We won't know until we catch thins thing!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New temporary location - GAME ISLAND!
- Never play games you don't know, especially when you're invited by some strangers. Still, if you miss fun and look for an adventure, then... it's time to go to Game Island!
- This island is a special one: it unlocks once a year on an important day... Of course, it's Vizor Games' birthday! To celebrate its 15th anniversary, Vizor has got a surprise for you: a festive adventure in three acts! Don't miss it!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Is it going to be a village life simulation, or some thrilling adventure roadtrip instead? You’ll never know until you check it!

🎒 Follow Atlantis trails and explore Atlantean civilization with aspiring adventurers Robert and Nicole! Will they meet some tribe life of Atlantean people? Will they build & restore an ancient magic town by themselves? Come and help them!

🌱 On any farm & adventure game, camp, food, and tools matter the most. Set up your farm, build factories and start to craft resources! Adventures in odyssey style are more exciting and complex than you could ever imagine! Farming, growing crops, gathering your own harvest are just a small part of this lost island adventure!

⚒ This area is packed with mysterious ruins! Restore Atlanteans’ magic workshops with the help of powerful crystals - be engaged in mythic & prehistoric adventures! Find all the hidden treasures and secret places of Atlantis Odyssey!

🔎 Want to explore Atlantis and the local culture even better? Complete all the trip adventure goals and work on farm produce orders! Complete challenging quests, breed animals, harvest crops, and have fun!

Nicole and Robert just started pitching a tent! Go help them with the rest of their farm & expedition adventures!
descriptionShort: Adventure & quests in a lost civilization: explore the island & enjoy the story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A new temporary location: SIRENS' ABODE!
- Pierre is freaked out: one of his photos shows the tail of a real siren! Or is it just a big fish? Or... No, we have to check it out!

container.value: Office 301, Leoforos Archiepiskopou Makariou III, 169, 3027, Limassol, Cyprus

creator: VIZOR APPS LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the island adventure of the Atlantis Odyssey game! Here you can not only dip into the exciting world of mysteries but upgrade your traveller skills: this lost civilization needs your knowledge. All you need to join this journey island is just your backpack - the adventure is already waiting for you!

So, what’s now? Let’s start our travel island odyssey! Congrats, you’ve just reached an unexplored spot on the world map! Your ‘fantasy vs. reality’ adventure in Atlantis is about to begin! Is it going to be a village life simulation, or some thrilling adventure roadtrip instead? You’ll never know until you check it!

🎒 Follow Atlantis trails and explore Atlantean civilization with aspiring adventurers Robert and Nicole! Will they meet some tribe life of Atlantean people? Will they build & restore an ancient magic town by themselves? Come and help them!

🌱 On any farm & adventure game, camp, food, and tools matter the most. Set up your farm, build factories and start to craft resources! Adventures in odyssey style are more exciting and complex than you could ever imagine! Farming, growing crops, gathering your own harvest are just a small part of this lost island adventure!

⚒ This area is packed with mysterious ruins! Restore Atlanteans’ magic workshops with the help of powerful crystals - be engaged in mythic & prehistoric adventures! Find all the hidden treasures and secret places of Atlantis Odyssey!

🔎 Want to explore Atlantis and the local culture even better? Complete all the trip adventure goals and work on farm produce orders! Complete challenging quests, breed animals, harvest crops, and have fun!

Nicole and Robert just started pitching a tent! Go help them with the rest of their farm & expedition adventures!
descriptionShort: Adventure game: Discover the secrets of Atlantis

appDetails.developerAddress: Office 301, Leoforos Archiepiskopou Makariou III, 169, 3027, Limassol, Cyprus
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New temporary location: FAIRY-TALE KINGDOM!
- What's that sobbing heard nearby? A certain Brave Han'so is missing, and some Atlantean kid is very sad about it!
- Help young Tim'my find his best friend in the Fairy-Tale Kingdom, the haven of dreamers and those who love tales about knights and dragons!

So, what’s now? Let’s start our travel island odyssey! Congrats, you’ve just reached an unexplored spot on the world map! Your ‘fantasy vs. reality’ adventure in Atlantis is about to begin! Is it going to be a village life simulation, or some thrilling adventure roadtrip instead? You’ll never know until you check it!

🎒 Follow Atlantis trails and explore Atlantean civilization with aspiring adventurers Robert and Nicole! Will they meet some tribe life of Atlantean people? Will they build & restore an ancient magic town by themselves? Come and help them!

🌱 On any farm & adventure game, camp, food, and tools matter the most. Set up your farm, build factories and start to craft resources! Adventures in odyssey style are more exciting and complex than you could ever imagine! Farming, growing crops, gathering your own harvest are just a small part of this lost island adventure!

⚒ This area is packed with mysterious ruins! Restore Atlanteans’ magic workshops with the help of powerful crystals - be engaged in mythic & prehistoric adventures! Find all the hidden treasures and secret places of Atlantis Odyssey!

🔎 Want to explore Atlantis and the local culture even better? Complete all the trip adventure goals and work on farm produce orders! Complete challenging quests, breed animals, harvest crops, and have fun!

Nicole and Robert just started pitching a tent! Go help them with the rest of their farm & expedition adventures!
descriptionShort: Adventure game: Discover the secrets of Atlantis

appDetails.developerAddress: Office 301, Leoforos Archiepiskopou Makariou III, 169, 3027, Limassol, Cyprus
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New temporary location: ELECTRIC FOREST!
- After hearing the call for help on the radio, our heroes hit the road immediately.
- How will the search for the unknown victim unfold? And what adventures await our friends? You'll find out soon!

descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the island adventure of the Atlantis Odyssey game! Here you can not only dip into the exciting world of mysteries but upgrade your traveller skills: this lost civilization needs your knowledge. All you need to join this journey island is just your backpack - the adventure is already waiting for you!

So, what’s now? Let’s start our travel island odyssey! Congrats, you’ve just reached an unexplored spot on the world map! Your ‘fantasy vs. reality’ adventure in Atlantis is about to begin! Is it going to be a village life simulation, or some thrilling adventure roadtrip instead? You’ll never know until you check it!

🎒 Follow Atlantis trails and explore Atlantean civilization with aspiring adventurers Robert and Nicole! Will they meet some tribe life of Atlantean people? Will they build & restore an ancient magic town by themselves? Come and help them!
